tn.text: The idea of "himself" stands here for the king's army. AT: "prepared the army to be able to battle Israel" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
These are military encampments for protection.

tn.ref: walked in the first ways of his father
tn.text: Behaving is spoken of as if it were walking. AT: "lived in the righteous ways of his ancestor" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
Did not worship the Baal idols in order to seek help from them. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:2ch:14:01|14:3]]
